tool_description: The VAT Number Validation API offers instant EU VAT number validation with extraction of the business/company details from the VIES database (including those for Northern Ireland starting with XI post Brexit).
name: VAT Number Validation
title: VAT Number Validation

api_list.name: Validate EU VAT Number (Option 2)
api_list.description: This endpoint will return the date and time of the request, whether the VAT number is valid and the company details (name and address) for a specific VAT number.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://vat-number-validation.p.rapidapi.com/api/validate"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "vat-number-validation.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
